channel.title: New Types of King
channel.description:
So... Every single person is suggesting these Special Types of King why not suggest my versions
The Psycho King (If a NK become King)
Passives: Tenacity - Immune to Death and Occupy at Night
Day Ability: Royal Finger - Exactly same. 1 Day countdown Decide Fate - Exactly same. 1 charge
Night Ability: Guards! - Exactly same. 4 charges Cut the heads! - Send a Guard to Kill someone during the Night. Infinite uses
Goal: Kill everyone who seek your harm
Grudge King (If a Scorned become King)
Passives: Tenacity - Immune to Death and Occupy at Night
Day Ability: Royal Finger - Exactly same. 1 Day countdown
Night Ability: Guards! - Exactly same. 4 charges Send Maid - Send a Maid to frame one of your targets. 3 charges
Goal: Get one of your target executed during the Day
Protector King (If a Mercenary becomes King)
Passives: Tenacity - Occupy Immune during the Night Delusion - Commits Suicide if the original and new chosen one dies
Day Ability: Royal Finger - Exactly same. 1 Day countdown Decide Fate - Exactly same. 1 charge The New Chosen One (Replaces Decide fate for 2 days if original target dies) - Choose a new Chosen One. Infinite uses
Night Ability: Guards! - Send a guard to protect your target. 4 charges Medic! - Send a Medic to heal your target. 1 charge Vengeance (Replaces Medic! for 1 Night if your target gets executed during the Day) - If your target gets executed, send a guard to kill one of the guilty voters. 1 charge
Goal: Keep your target alive until the end of the Game
Lunatic King (If a Fool becomes King)
Passives: Tenacity - Occupy immune during the Night Poor King - No one can be executed for 3 days if you get executed
Day Ability: Royal Finger - Exactly same. 1 Day countdown Decide Fate - Exactly same. 1 charge
Night Ability: Guards! - Exactly same. 4 charges Block - Send a guard to block someone's room occupying them for that Night. Infinite uses
Goal: Get executed during the Day
Inquisitor King (If an Inquisitor become King)
Passives: Tenacity - Occupy immune during the Night Personal Guard - Death Immune once
Day Ability: Royal Finger - Exactly same. 1 Day countdown Decide Fate - Exactly same. 1 charge
Night Ability: Guards! - Exactly same. 4 charges Allies - Discover if a player is a Magic User. Infinite uses
Goal: Get the Sorcerer dead

item.title: New Types of King
item.dc:creator: Monkke
item.description:
Holy shit, a massive +1 for you mate, but as the person before me just said. Grudge king shouldn’t have decide fate, would make it a tad bit too easy.

Read full topic

item.title: New Types of King
item.dc:creator: lolman
item.description:
So… Every single person is suggesting these Special Types of King why not suggest my versions

The Psycho King (If a NK become King)

Passives:
Tenacity - Immune to Death and Occupy at Night

Day Ability:
Royal Finger - Exactly same. 1 Day countdown
Decide Fate - Exactly same. 1 charge

Night Ability:
Guards! - Exactly same. 4 charges
Cut the heads! - Send a Guard to Kill someone during the Night. Infinite uses

Goal: Kill everyone who seek your harm

Grudge King (If a Scorned become King)

Passives:
Tenacity - Immune to Death and Occupy at Night

Day Ability:
Royal Finger - Exactly same. 1 Day countdown

Night Ability:
Guards! - Exactly same. 4 charges
Send Maid - Send a Maid to frame one of your targets. 3 charges

Goal: Get one of your target executed during the Day

Protector King (If a Mercenary becomes King)

Passives:
Tenacity - Occupy Immune during the Night
Delusion - Commits Suicide if the original and new chosen one dies

Day Ability:
Royal Finger - Exactly same. 1 Day countdown
Decide Fate - Exactly same. 1 charge
The New Chosen One (Replaces Decide fate for 2 days if original target dies) - Choose a new Chosen One. Infinite uses

Night Ability:
Guards! - Send a guard to protect your target. 4 charges
Medic! - Send a Medic to heal your target. 1 charge
Vengeance (Replaces Medic! for 1 Night if your target gets executed during the Day) - If your target gets executed, send a guard to kill one of the guilty voters. 1 charge

Goal: Keep your target alive until the end of the Game

Lunatic King (If a Fool becomes King)

Passives:
Tenacity - Occupy immune during the Night
Poor King - No one can be executed for 3 days if you get executed

Day Ability:
Royal Finger - Exactly same. 1 Day countdown
Decide Fate - Exactly same. 1 charge

Night Ability:
Guards! - Exactly same. 4 charges
Block - Send a guard to block someone’s room occupying them for that Night. Infinite uses

Goal: Get executed during the Day

Inquisitor King (If an Inquisitor become King)

Passives:
Tenacity - Occupy immune during the Night
Personal Guard - Death Immune once

Day Ability:
Royal Finger - Exactly same. 1 Day countdown
Decide Fate - Exactly same. 1 charge

Night Ability:
Guards! - Exactly same. 4 charges
Allies - Discover if a player is a Magic User. Infinite uses

Goal: Get the Sorcerer dead

Read full topic
